children.content:
Computer Science

I'm a passionate of Computer Science!!
I do spend most of my free time programming things in various languages and for various purpose!
From the OpenSource collaboration to the Hacking Box and Mathematics & Algorithmics,
I do love to explore all the sides of Computer Science and I've always that eager to learn new things !!

Music

I'm kind of a music nerd as I love listening to a lot of different kinds of music.
Discovering new styles and explore the way we can understand and interpret it.
The way we react to music and feel it is a mystery that I want to solve
I do some composing and I analize all the music I listen to!
In conclusion, I'm the music nerd with a playlist for each mood.
And I can't give you one song advice, I'll create a whole playlist for you!

Art & Cultures

As I'm curious I love to discover things, and especially art.
Art is a way for me to understand the world and the many perceptions we can have
Understanding art helps us Understanding the world around us in a deeper way than just observing
And the differents cultures (related to the art most of the time) does explain the same things.
Art & Culture is an amazing way to understand our world.
Why would you be a good team mate ?

Autonomy

I do am really autonomous as I've always worked on personal project and learned to overstep difficulty by myself.
From my various investissement in personal project I've learned how to be autonomous and find solutions by myself.
I know how to solve problem and not getting stuck on them and hoping someone would save me!
We're not in Disney, life isn't that easy!

Team Work

As I said just upper, I'm autonomous, but that doesn't mean I don't know how to work with a team!
From my work experiences, my Hackatons, my Online and school projects, I've learn to work in team.
I know how to collaborate with people efficiently and in a healthy environnement.

Adaptation & Flexibility

From my personal projects, school projects and work experiences, I've learned how to adapt to various situation.
I know how to manage stress and changes, so I can reorient myself pretty quick and be as flexible as possible

Communication

I'm an easy talker and I like to share with others.
My ability to speak english helps me communicate with the largest range of people possible.
I easly integrate myself in groups and fit well in teams!
As I'm practicing english with foreign friends, I've an english that goes pretty fluently.
Besides small mistakes, I always manage to make people understand me without any struggle!
How did you learn what you know ?

Passion

My curiosity is one of my best qualities, and mixed with passion I'm unstoppable!
(This is not a professional resume so of course I can say that ahah!)
I usually gets really interested and then do a lot of research
Once this done I usually practice all the things I've learned!!
And all those little things that i've learned helps me on day or an other !
By doing this I've acquired a lot of resources useful in many situations!

School

I'm a Computer Science student so of course most of my knowledge come from here !
I'm doing a Computer Science DUT in Clermont-Ferrand and I'm actually in my seconde year!
I've learned lots of different technical skills such as OOP/Networks/Database/Algorithmics
But I've learned lots of soft skills too such as Organisation, Team Work, Modelisation .

On the Run!

And most of my knowledge come from practicing, with the tons of differents projects I use and invest in.
I work in multiple languages, with different strategies and with team with differents backgrounds and methods.
Solving problems learned me a lot of new techniques that i would have never heard of without this experience.
Through this investissement, I've learned most of my technical skills

Mail

Easiest and fastest way to get in touch with me!
Here is my mail: romainolivier42@gmail.com

GitHub

Want to see a bit of my work before communicating with me? Sure! Here is my GitHub

LinkedIn

Really professional but slower that my other contacts. Here is my LinkedIn
